Our Big Day

我們特別的日子

When

什麼時候

3 December 2022
2022年12月3日
|

Where

地點

The Christchurch Club, 154 Worcester Street

Accomodation at the Rydges

住宿: Rydges

All wedding guests will receive 12% off at the Rydges Hotel, just on the other side of Latimer Square from the wedding venue
所有參加婚禮的賓客可在 Rydges 酒店享有 12% 的折扣，酒店就在婚禮場地 Latimer Square 的對面
Code to use: CE22WEB
折扣代碼: CE22WEB
  1. Visit 點選飯店官網 www.rydges.com.
  2. Select Rydges Latimer Christchurch, enter your dates and number of people and click ‘GO’. 選擇"Rydges Latimer Christchurch",選擇日期、人數，點選Go
  3. Click ‘I have a code’. 選擇 'I have a code'.
  4. In the ‘Corporate ID’ field enter your booking code: 在Corporate ID的欄位中打入'CE22WEB' CE22WEB
  5. Click ‘UPDATE’. 選擇 ‘UPDATE’.
  6. Your special rates will appear on the rates screen. 您將會看到優惠價格
